dashboard.No created songs found: No created songs found... Click the new song button below to create one.
dashboard.No folders found: No folders found... Click the new folder button below to create one.

editor.No lyrics: No lyrics in the database for this song...

folder.Delete this folder: Do you really want to delete this folder
folder.Name: Name
folder.No songs found in this folder: No songs found in this folder...

infos.Search details: Here you can search and display songs one by one, but you need to sign in if you want to build a repertoire, a song list for an event, save your songs, etc.

register.Too short: Password must be at least {{passwordLengthMin}} characters long

search.No results try advanced: No results for this search: please try another one. You can use less specific keywords. Different criteria can help you in the advanced search options
search.Possible to add: If the song does not exist in the database, you can add it once you logged in.
search.Search possibilities: Search by titles, lyrics, authors, editors, classifications. Use the settings button
search.in the searchfield: in the search field to open advanced search settings.

station.Broadcast not started: This broadcast has not started yet

notWrittenYet.title: Sorry
notWrittenYet.1: This part of the tutorial is not available yet...

globalNavigation.title: Navigation
globalNavigation.1: Click the logo in the top left corner to expand/collapse the menu buttons. Click the menu icon <1 /> to open the full menu.
globalNavigation.auth: Click the personnal space icon <1 /> to access your personnal space.
globalNavigation.unAuth: You must be signed in to access your personnal space, data, songlists, ... Click the personnal space icon <1 /> to sign in ou sign up.

searchSong.title: Song search
searchSong.1:
Write any keyword from a title, an author, an editor, or a classification in the search field.
If you get too much results you are not interested in, add more keywords or open the advanced search options:<3 />.
Click on an option, then type your keyword inside the corresponding brackets "[ ]". Add as many options as you want.
Ex: silence $before[1910] $authors[bach]

sortList.title: Sort songs list
sortList.1:
In the advanced options, you will find a "$t(search.Sort)" button. Click on it to enable sorting.
A sorting header will appear above the list: click on a sorting option to sort the list, and a second time to sort in reverse order.
Click a third time to remove this sorting, or on the close icon <5 /> to leave the sorting options.

chooseSong.title: Choosing a song
chooseSong.1:
Once a list of songs is displayed, you can choose the one you were looking for by clicking the check mark <1 /> at its right.
You may not be sure which one to choose: just click on one song elsewhere than on the check mark to have a closer look at it.

favorites.title: Mark favorites songs
favorites.auth:
In the list, you can also click the favorite icon <1 /> of a song to mark it as a favorite. Click once again to unmark it.
Among the advanced search options, a "Favorites" button allows you to only display your favorites songs.
favorites.unAuth: When you are signed in, you can mark the songs you like as favorites, and display only your favorite songs thanks to a new advanced search option.

displaySong.title: Display a song
displaySong.1:
Click on the paragraphs you want to select them, or on the "$t(editor.Select all)" button to select all of them.
Then click the check button <3 /> to display the song in the view mode.
There, you can use the <7 /> and <9 /> button to change the font size, and the <11 /> button to close the viewer.

editSong.title: Song edition
editSong.auth:
Click the edit button <1 /> to enter the edit mode.
Once you are done, click on the "t(editor.Save all)" or the "t(editor.Cancel all)" button to quit editing.
You can erase the edited song by clicking on the bottom delete icon <7 />.
editSong.unAuth:
Once signed in, you will be able to edit and save the song here.
Click the personnal space icon <4 /> in the top right menu to sign in.

editParagraph.title: Paragraph edition
editParagraph.auth:
Once you have entered the edit mode, choose a paragraph and click its edit button <1 /> to edit it.
Make any change to it, then click on its check icon <5 /> to save or its cancel icon <7 /> to dismiss your changes.
You can delete this paragraph by clicking on its delete icon <11 />.
You can also click its up and down arrows <15 /><16 /> move it up or down and reorder the song.
Finally, you can edit the titles and data about the song the same way, using the edit button <20 /> next to the title.
editParagraph.unAuth:
Once signed in, you will be able edit the titles, data, paragraphs, and reorder them as you wish here.
Click the personnal space icon <4 /> in the top right menu to sign in.

signIn.title: Signing in
signIn.1: If you already signed up, you just need to enter here the email adress you used to sign up in the email field, and the password you chose in the password field.

signUp.title: Signing up
signUp.1:
If you have not signed up yet, to do so, you just need to enter a valid email adress in the email field, and enter a password you will remember in the password field.
Your password must be at least 6 characters long.

notSignedUp.title: If have not signed up yet
notSignedUp.1: If you have not signed up yet, click the "$t(register.Need an account)" link to sign up.

alreadySignedUp.title: If you have already signed up
alreadySignedUp.1: If you already signed up, click the "$t(register.Already have an account)" link to sign in.
